# IAGUS - Laravel 11 Fresh Project Setup

## Project Type
- Laravel 11 Web Application
- Event Management System for Church
- Mercado Pago Payment Integration
- PHP 8.2+

## Progress

- [x] Verify copilot-instructions.md created
- [x] Clarify Project Requirements - Laravel 11, Event Management, Mercado Pago
- [x] Scaffold the Project  
- [x] Customize the Project
- [x] Install Required Extensions

- [x] Create and Run Task

- [x] Ensure Documentation is Complete

## Latest Updates (Feb 09, 2026)

### Server Configuration
- **Port Changed:** Laravel now runs on port 3001 (was 8000)
- **Access URL:** http://localhost:3001
- **Vite HMR:** http://localhost:5173

### Scripts Updated
- ✅ start.bat - Windows batch script
- ✅ start-powershell.ps1 - PowerShell script
- ✅ start.sh - Bash script (Linux/Mac/Git Bash)
- ✅ herd-start.sh - Laravel Herd optimized
